decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted ( 02, 03A, 04C, 05, 06B, 08B and 10 received on 7 December 2017 ) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - No development shall take place until samples of the materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the hereby permitted have been submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning authority.  Development shall be carried out in accordance with the approved details

Condition : 4 - The site shall be occupied by a maximum of 99 people at any given time and shall be used as an adult learning centre (C2 use) or community centre (D2 use) with ancillary creche and office facilities and for no other purpose (including any other purpose in Class C2 and/or D2 use of the Schedule to the Town and Country Planning (Use Classes) Order 1987, or in any provision equivalent to that Class in any statutory instrument revoking and re-enacting that Order with or without modification).
description: Erection of an annexe extension with Art studios and store areas to existing Adult & Community Education Centre
